> ::Zardus/Breakdown/Scavanger/Hiss/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Perndabot::
>
> Zardus reaches for his weapon as Panzertron explains about the alarms, but
> remembers that he had checked his weapons in. Zardus' eyes narrow as he
looks
> at the monitor.
>
> "I may be of some help here..." he says to Panzertron, activating his
> comm-link.
>
> "Dark One, some destrons are attacking the Iron Fist. Can you take your
group
> and attack at their base?" he says into the device.
>
> "Well," Dark One's voice replies, sounding like was carrying something,
"Me
> and Pyro are kinda dragging the prisoners to the torture chambers."
>
> Zardus' eyes widen, "Any reason?"
>
> "Maximals are apparently more suicidal than we had thought. Tigerhawk
tried
> to rescue them. Alone. Now we're showing them what happens from that."
>
> "Good. In that case...." Zardus pauses, looking down at his wrist comp,
> checking the locations of all Alliance bots. He switches his comm-link to
> transmit to all Alliance members, "Reptilica, Bloodystrike, Hiss,
Scavanger,
> Breakdown, and Scattershot, please pay a little visit to our destron
friends.
> Attack their base untill they are forced to retreat from the Iron Fist,
then
> back down."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Breakdown, Scavanger, Hiss and Scattershot set off for the Destron base,
> leaving their repairs on the base unfinished.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Perndabot's eyes winden as BrightBlade answers. "A stealth mission?!
You're
> planning to infultrate a fully functional ship that is surrounded by miles
of
> grasland. That's sui-" he's interrupted by Bloodystrike walking up to him,
> failing to see Gangon's spark.
>
> Bloodystrike looks up at Perndabot craining his neck up to look at the
other
> bot. "Hear that?," he asks, refferring to Zardus' transmission, "Ya mind
> tossin' me Reptilica?"
>
> Perndabot growls, easily tossing Reptilica to Bloodystrike. Bloodystrike
> quickly runs off, dragging Reptilica toward the Destron base. He'd wake up
on
> the way, Bloodystrike figures, jumping over a bush.
>
> Perndabot looks back at BrightBlade, his eyes sliding down her body, but
then
> to the spark in front of her. "Who's that?" he asks, taking out his gun
just
> in case.
>
